column4: I'm having an issue with wireless drivers.  Atheros 802.11g card.  Drivers say they're activated and currently in use.  Unable to see it in iwconfig
Can someone help me real fast witha wireless issue?
You'll need to give us specific details, please don't ask to ask, just ask
I did.  I will ask again, though.
I'm having an issue with wireless drivers.  Atheros 802.11g card.  Drivers say they're activated and currently in use.  Unable to see it in iwconfig
Ahh, I see it now, sorry Huufarted
okay, one sec, let me see what I can find
ah, that explains a lot, GuruDrew.  I didn't find that.  I was going through the standard one-doc-fits-all documentation, not card specific
yeah, should solve your issue, let me know if it doesn't.
